Posts.Content: I am looking for pro's and con's of participating in a Tailor x Clinical Trial.  April 28th I had a lumpectomy and Sentinal Node biopsy.  Diagnoses is a Stage I Breast Cancer.  Two Lymph nodes were removed, neither were cancerous.  The tumor was 1.3 centimeters with a grade of 2.  Radiation to follow.  My oncologist has asked if I would like to participate in the Tailor x Clinical trial.  I am just looking for more information.  I am hoping you all can help with advice.  Thank you. Kathy
Posts.Title: The Tailorx Clinical Trial
